languages.text: {n}Эльдарка собирается с духом и вытягивается, словно струна хрупкой изысканной лиры. Ее рука все еще по привычке тянется к расколотому камню душ.{/n} "Поначалу я думала, что встреча с тобой принесет моей душе лишь боль и проклятие..."

{n}Yrliet musters her courage and draws herself up straight like the string of a delicate, exquisite lyre. Her hand still reaches for her shattered spirit stone out of habit.{/n} "At first I thought that meeting you would bring my soul only pain and malediction..."
languages.original_text: {n}Эльдарка собирается с духом и вытягивается, словно струна хрупкой изысканной лиры. Ее рука все еще по привычке тянется к расколотому камню душ.{/n} "Поначалу я думала, что встреча с тобой принесет моей душе лишь боль и проклятие..."

traits.locale_text: {n}The Aeldari musters her courage and straightens herself like a string of a fragile, exquisite lyre. Her hand still reaches for her shattered spirit stone out of habit.{/n} "At first I thought that meeting you would bring my soul only pain and malediction..."

{n}The Aeldari musters her courage and straightens herself like a string of a fragile, exquisite lyre. Her hand still reaches for her shattered spirit stone out of habit.{/n} "At first I thought that meeting you would bring my soul only pain and malediction..."

{n}Yrliet musters her courage and draws herself up straight like the string of a delicate, exquisite lyre. Her hand still reaches for her shattered spirit stone out of habit.{/n} "At first I thought that meeting you would bring my soul only pain and malediction..."

{n}Yrliet musters her courage and draws herself up straight like the string of a delicate, exquisite lyre. Her hand still reaches for her shattered spirit stone out of habit.{/n} "At first I thought that meeting you would bring my soul only pain and malediction..."

{n}Yrliet musters her courage and draws herself up straight like the string of a delicate, exquisite lyre. Her hand still reaches for her shattered spirit stone out of habit.{/n} "At first I thought that meeting you would bring my soul only pain and malediction..."

languages.text: {n}伊莉耶特鼓起勇气，身体像七弦琴的纤细琴弦一样绷得笔直。她习惯性地抚摸着碎裂的灵魂石。{/n}“起初，我以为与你的邂逅只会带来痛苦和诅咒……”
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet musters her courage and draws herself up straight like the string of a delicate, exquisite lyre. Her hand still reaches for her shattered spirit stone out of habit.{/n} "At first I thought that meeting you would bring my soul only pain and malediction..."

traits.locale_text: {n}伊莉耶特鼓起勇气，身体像七弦琴的纤细琴弦一样绷得笔直。她习惯性地抚摸着碎裂的灵魂石。{/n}“起初，我以为与你的邂逅只会带来痛苦和诅咒……”

languages.text: {n}Yrliet hace acopio de valor y se endereza como si tensara la cuerda de una lira exquisita y delicada. La fuerza de la costumbre hace que se lleve la mano a su joya espiritual rota.{/n} «Al principio creí que conocerte no aportaría más que dolor y mortificación a mi alma...».
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet musters her courage and draws herself up straight like the string of a delicate, exquisite lyre. Her hand still reaches for her shattered spirit stone out of habit.{/n} "At first I thought that meeting you would bring my soul only pain and malediction..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet hace acopio de valor y se endereza como si tensara la cuerda de una lira exquisita y delicada. La fuerza de la costumbre hace que se lleve la mano a su joya espiritual rota.{/n} «Al principio creí que conocerte no aportaría más que dolor y mortificación a mi alma...».

languages.text: {n}Yrliet rassemble son courage et se redresse telle la corde d'une gracieuse lyre. Machinalement, elle porte sa main à sa pierre-esprit brisée.{/n} « Quand je vous ai {mf|rencontré|rencontrée}, je pensais que vous n'apporteriez à mon âme que douleur et malédiction... »
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet musters her courage and draws herself up straight like the string of a delicate, exquisite lyre. Her hand still reaches for her shattered spirit stone out of habit.{/n} "At first I thought that meeting you would bring my soul only pain and malediction..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet rassemble son courage et se redresse telle la corde d'une gracieuse lyre. Machinalement, elle porte sa main à sa pierre-esprit brisée.{/n} « Quand je vous ai {mf|rencontré|rencontrée}, je pensais que vous n'apporteriez à mon âme que douleur et malédiction... »

languages.text: {n}Yrliet nimmt ihren Mut zusammen und stellt sich kerzengerade hin, wie eine Seite einer zarten, erstklassigen Lyra. Aus Gewohnheit greift ihre Hand nach ihrem zerstörten Seelenstein.{/n} "Anfangs dachte ich, das Zusammentreffen mit Euch brächte meiner Seele nur Schmerz und Unglück ..."
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet musters her courage and draws herself up straight like the string of a delicate, exquisite lyre. Her hand still reaches for her shattered spirit stone out of habit.{/n} "At first I thought that meeting you would bring my soul only pain and malediction..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet nimmt ihren Mut zusammen und stellt sich kerzengerade hin, wie eine Seite einer zarten, erstklassigen Lyra. Aus Gewohnheit greift ihre Hand nach ihrem zerstörten Seelenstein.{/n} "Anfangs dachte ich, das Zusammentreffen mit Euch brächte meiner Seele nur Schmerz und Unglück ..."

languages.text: {n}ユリエットは勇気を奮い立たせ、繊細で精巧な竪琴の弦のように、まっすぐに身を引き締める。彼女の手は、砕けた魂縛石に心ともなく手を伸ばしたままだ。{/n}「最初は、あなたに会っても私の魂には苦痛と災いしかもたらされないと思ったのだが…」
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet musters her courage and draws herself up straight like the string of a delicate, exquisite lyre. Her hand still reaches for her shattered spirit stone out of habit.{/n} "At first I thought that meeting you would bring my soul only pain and malediction..."

traits.locale_text: {n}ユリエットは勇気を奮い立たせ、繊細で精巧な竪琴の弦のように、まっすぐに身を引き締める。彼女の手は、砕けた魂縛石に心ともなく手を伸ばしたままだ。{/n}「最初は、あなたに会っても私の魂には苦痛と災いしかもたらされないと思ったのだが…」

languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet musters her courage and draws herself up straight like the string of a delicate, exquisite lyre. Her hand still reaches for her shattered spirit stone out of habit.{/n} "At first I thought that meeting you would bring my soul only pain and malediction..."

languages.text: {n}Yrliet cesaretini toplayıp narin, kibar bir lir gibi duruşunu dikleştiriyor. Eli alışkanlıktan parçalanmış ruh taşına gidiyor.{/n} "Başlarda seninle görüşmemin ruhuma sadece acı ve lanet getireceğini düşünmüştüm..."
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet musters her courage and draws herself up straight like the string of a delicate, exquisite lyre. Her hand still reaches for her shattered spirit stone out of habit.{/n} "At first I thought that meeting you would bring my soul only pain and malediction..."
